data.name: Don't Starve Together: Starter Pack 2021
data.detailed_description:
Starter Pack 2021

A new year is upon us, and with it comes a new assortment of essentials for the fashion-conscious survivor. After all, being stuck out in the unforgiving wilderness is no excuse to stop keeping up appearances!

Starter Pack 2021 Includes:

  • A new playable character, Wanda, the Timekeeper!
    Wanda has arrived just in time! For what? Hm, well she's pretty sure there was something important, now what was it again...


  • Wilson's Snowfallen Skin Set


  • Willow's Victorian Skin Set


  • Walter's Guest of Honor Skin Set


  • Winona's Roseate Skin Set


  • Two new item skins, the Rustic Torch and Splumonkey Sack


  • Yawny Jammies Ensemble, with bonus Yawn emote.

data.short_description: This Chest contains the playable character, Wanda: The Timekeeper, Wilson's Snowfallen skin set, Willow's Victorian skin set, Walter's Guest of Honor skin set, Winona's Roseate skin set, the Rustic Torch, the Splumonkey Sack, and the Yawny Jammies Ensemble.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
